project_name.justification: The project is identified as the 'North Fork Rare Earth Project' in the document. The authoritative metadata also lists the project name as 'North Fork'.

company_name.justification: The authoritative metadata lists the company name as 'Megado Minerals Ltd'. The document confirms this is the selling company: 'Megado Minerals Limited (ASX: MEG) (Megado or the Company) is pleased to advise it has executed an Exploration Agreement with Option to Purchase...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The document does not mention the CEO of the buyer, Iluka Resources Limited.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement includes an option for the buyer to acquire the full project interest. 'Second Tranche: At any time during the two-year exclusive exploration period, Iluka may elect to purchase 100% of the Project...'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata specifies 'REE'. The text confirms this by naming the project the 'North Fork Rare Earth Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text does not contain a full, verifiable URL for the article.

currency.justification: The primary payment tranches are denominated in Australian Dollars ('A$'). 'First Tranche – Iluka to pay A$500k... Second Tranche – ...purchase 100% of the Project for A$1m... Third Tranche – Iluka to pay Megado A$2m...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash consideration is the sum of the three tranches: A$500,000 (Tranche 1) + A$1,000,000 (Tranche 2) + A$2,000,000 (Tranche 3). 'First Tranche – Iluka to pay A$500k... Second Tranche – ...purchase 100% of the Project for A$1m... Third Tranche – Iluka to pay Megado A$2m...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in the form of shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment terms are explicitly broken down into cash tranches, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any issuance of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in the form of share warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in the form of options.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any issuance of shares, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The agreement does not specify an exploration commitment in terms of meters drilled.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The agreement states that exploration costs will be on the buyer's account, but does not specify a minimum monetary commitment. '...with all exploration costs and claim maintenance fees on Iluka’s account during this period...'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The third tranche payment can be converted into a royalty retained by the seller (Megado). A Gross Revenue Royalty is treated as an NSR. 'Iluka may convert this obligation to a 2% gross revenue royalty.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document does not specify the size or area of the project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The document does not specify the size or area of the project.

resource_size.justification: The document does not contain any statement of mineral resources for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as a subsidiary of Iluka Resources Limited, whose ticker is explicitly stated in the text: '...a wholly owned subsidiary of Iluka Resources Limited (ASX: ILU) (Iluka)...'
